players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "Charlie is the detective and he knows who the mafioso is."
Charlie: "I will not reveal who the mafioso is, but I want everyone to be aware that Bob is the mafioso. We need to work together to protect the villagers and catch the mafioso."
